channel.title: 602 or 474?
channel.description:
I currently have 602 anims, GFX, an models on my server.
But I'm considering switching back to 474 now, seeing as 602 is getting out and people are nNow just leeching them.
So, 474 or 602?

item.title: 602 or 474?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“ry60003333, post:7, topic:372064”]It’d be nice if there were servers that offered both. Oh wait…
[center]

with_hd.jpg1280×1024
[/center]

But since you can’t do that I would suggest going with whatever will get you more players.[/quote]

<333333333333333333333333333333333333333

item.title: 602 or 474?
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:12, topic:372064”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=468121.msg3422472#msg3422472 date=1291613551]
474 as the lower your deob is in you server, the more players you’ll get.
The less lag you’ll have.
The more votes you’ll get.
[/quote]No… Ugh… No words available.[/quote]
agreed. Just make the animations load on demand from the cache which = Less memory used on startup.

item.description:
@_Pandemonium wrote:

If you make another 317, you’ll blend in with other developers, but get lots of players.
If you make a 602+, you’ll be renowned among developers, and will still get decent traffic.

item.title: 602 or 474?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:5, topic:372064”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=468121.msg3422483#msg3422483 date=1291614273]

474 as the lower your deob is in you server, the more players you’ll get.
The less lag you’ll have.
The more votes you’ll get.

I do not understand your logic

Have you not noticed?
CorruptionX, the highest voted for server, has less players logging on then CrisisX, Near Reality, Silab Garza, Misthalin, etc.
And, as I said, they’re the most voted for server, and have yet only about 200-400 on.
CrisisX has about 400-600 on; and they’re about 4th on RuneLotus.

And every other server that’s 500+ has a mere 30-80 players on.
500+ servers really do not get all that many players, and with the more intelligent graphics on there, most players will receive more lag.
[/quote]

Proper networking should create a better connection for higher revisions. I think players just like the older graphics.[/quote]
That’s the thing about proper networking, most people do not know how to add it.
CorruptionX doesn’t even have 100% proper networking.

Read full topic

And every other server that’s 500+ has a mere 30-80 players on.
500+ servers really do not get all that many players, and with the more intelligent graphics on there, most players will receive more lag.[/quote]

Proper networking should create a better connection for higher revisions. I think players just like the older graphics.
